title-group.article-title: Author Correction: Higher cognitive load interferes with head-hand coordination: virtual reality-based study

body.p: Correction to: Scientific Reports 10.1038/s41598-023-43337-x, published online 17 October 2023

The original version of this Article contained errors in the names of the authors Adi Lustig, Meytal Wilf, Israel Dudkiewicz & Meir Plotnik, which were incorrectly given as Lustig Adi, Wilf Meytal, Dudkiewicz Israel & Plotnik Meir.
The original Article and accompanying Supplementary Information video file have been corrected.
